channel.title: Glitch: Elevator Won't Activate Twice [Fixed]
channel.description:
After the disaster in Unforeseen Consequences, you have to go down an elevator. I pressed the button, then quickly ran out before it could move. I got some damage and the elevator moved back up. After that, the elevator wouldn't activate again.
![](upload://v8gSspIJrzGxmeKbFUNaPvS6qlD.jpeg) ] status hostname: Half-Life 2 version : 1.0.1.0/14 4104 insecure map : bm_c1a1a at: 1300 x, 1837 y, -448 z players : 1 (1 max)
# userid name uniqueid connected ping loss state adr # 3 "Stephan" UNKNOWN 00:05 18 0 active loopback ] getpos setpos 1300.676514 1837.000000 -448.468750;setang -3.692138 -72.524864 0.000000
